name: London Weekend Sightseeing
description: A two-day London itinerary covering major landmarks and cultural highlights. Dinner steps use ALAP timing to push them as late in the day as possible.

steps.title: Tower of London
steps.description: Explore the medieval fortress, Crown Jewels, and Beefeaters

steps.title: Borough Market lunch
steps.description: Graze through Borough Market — street food, cheese, and fresh bread

steps.title: Thames Southbank walk
steps.description: Stroll along the Southbank past the Globe Theatre and Tate Modern

steps.title: Tate Modern
steps.description: Visit the Turbine Hall and rotating exhibitions

steps.title: Day 1 dinner
steps.description: Dinner at a riverside restaurant in Southbank

steps.title: British Museum
steps.description: Rosetta Stone, Egyptian mummies, Greek antiquities — allow plenty of time

steps.title: Covent Garden lunch
steps.description: Lunch and street performance watching in Covent Garden piazza

steps.title: Westminster walk
steps.description: Big Ben, Houses of Parliament, Westminster Abbey exterior, St James's Park

steps.title: London Eye
steps.description: 30-minute capsule ride with panoramic city views

steps.title: Day 2 dinner
steps.description: Farewell dinner at a restaurant near the Eye
